comment.author: 52391976@N02
comment._content: The building on the corner was known as No 1 Collins.  The land on which it sat was the first block of land, then half an acre, sold in Victoria. It was purchased by a distant ancestor of mine, James Ross.  It was required that landowners build a substantial  building, however the original building was demolished. There is a small plaque on the current building referring to No. 1 Collins.
